data.title: Long Island Lutheran Middle & High School
data.meta_description: Long Island Lutheran Middle & High School is a top private school, serving students from the 6th-12th grade, that provides affordable, independent, faith-based education. Learn More!
data.text:
Learning. Leading.

For Life.

We’re about more than just rigorous academics.

LuHi delivers a Christ-centered, college preparatory education through engaging, enriching programs that foster personal, academic, and spiritual growth. From grades 6 through 12, we are committed to developing compassionate and educated leaders for the future.

See yourself

at LuHi!

Schedule a tour, and see first-hand why families choose LuHi for their middle and high schoolers.

Academics

Our rigorous core classes and engaging electives are taught in a loving, supportive environment.

Arts

Our wide range of Visual and Performing Arts courses emphasize creativity and mastery.

Athletics

Our Athletics teams develop skills like discipline, cooperation, and teamwork in all student athletes.

Activities

Our Co-Curricular activities allow students to explore passions and develop leadership skills.

“

I will miss my friends, teachers, and coaches the most. They have all helped me grow by challenging me to be the best version of myself everyday. I will miss the sense of community and endless amount of support at LuHi – it is truly a very special place!!

Uta ’23, Smith College ’27
